block.p: SHANDROFF-Bertha. Died on October 26th at 94 years old. Daughter of Samuel and Sarah Yager. Beloved sister of the late Rose Hader and Rae Scolnick and Mitchell and Jack Yager. Wife of the late George Shandroff. Mother of Marilyn Averett and Arlene Kahn (Donald). Grandmother of Dr. Susan Greenberg (Dr. Michael), Laurie Segal (Dr. Mark), Wendy Wolff (Dr. Michael). Nana of Ariel, Asher, Alissa, Erica, Aaron, Emily, Melissa.
